import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) cart.prices = {'Items':0, 'Shipping': 0, 'Tax': 0, 'Total': 0}; cart.cartItems.map((item) => {}) const placeOrder = () => { console.log('Placed Order') } return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{ cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your Cart is Empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item,index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X Rs.{item.price} = Rs.{(item.price * item.qty ).toFixed(2) } ))} ) }

Order Summary

Items: Rs.{cart.itemsPrice} Shipping: Rs.{cart.shippingPrice} Tax: Rs.{cart.taxPrice} Total: Rs.{cart.totalPrice}
); } export default PlaceOrderScreen;
